greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Indices of Ennesrem primes: k such that A004094(k)-1 is prime.
link: N. J. A. Sloane, Exciting Number Sequences (video of talk), Mar 05 2021.
example: 13 is a term, since 2^13 = 8192 -> 2918 -> 2917, which is prime.
program: if ok(k): print(k, end=", ") # _Michael S. Branicky_, Feb 20 2021
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 20 2021
